item.title: Report X-2024051599
item.description:
Report X-2024051599

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-07T18:15:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-21
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WEARING PROPER PPE AND USING DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL OF A DAMP PACKAGE OUTSIDE THE HAZ MAT AUDITORS OFFICE. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER OBSEVRVED A DAMP DIAMOND HAZARD PACKAGE, PROMPTLY AND SAFELY TRANSPORTED THE DAMP PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FUTHER INVESTIGATION AND PROCESSING.
